sig_info: While the Opponent is under the effect of an Armor Break Debuff they are Passively Heal Blocked, whenever the Opponent would gain health from regeneration, they are inflicted with a Power Drain Debuff, draining 1 to 3.5% of their current Power over 0.50 seconds for each Armor Break Debuff on them. If the Opponent has the Salve Mastery active, it is removed.
Rocket’s Shield System grants him 861.54 to 1257.33 Crit Resistance.
While Dormant, Rocket’s Shield System grants him 351.22 to 824.33 Block Proficiency. This effect also persists while the Shield System is activated.

SCRAP METAL - MAX 50: Even while in a fight, Rocket actively hunts for metal scraps to make weapons of mass destruction.
All of Rocket’s Attacks gain increased Critical Rating by 282.35 for each hit in the Combo Meter.
Whenever Rocket lands a Critical Hit, Rocket chips away at the Opponent’s Armor and Weapons, granting him 2 Scrap Metal. This value becomes 3 when fighting against #Metal Opponents.
Whenever an Armor Break effect removes an Armor Up Buff from the Opponent, Rocket steals the broken Armor pieces and gains 10 Scrap Metal.
SHIELD SYSTEM: Whenever Rocket Dashes back and holds block for 1.20 second(s), he will use 25 Scrap Metal to construct a dormant Shield System to protect him from threats.
When Rocket is struck with the dormant Shield System, it will activate and last for 6 seconds. Activated Shield Systems grant the following effects:
+ 861.54 Armor Rating.
+ 861.54 Physical Resistance.
+ 30% Special Attack Resistance.
Combo Shield, preventing Rocket’s Combo Meter from resetting when struck.
The Shield System can also Block Unblockable Attacks from Mutant Champions. A Shield System will activate early when Rocket would be struck by a Mutant’s Unblockable Attack.
HEAVY ATTACKS: The first hit of Heavy Attack consumes 10 Scrap Metal to inflict an Armor Break Debuff. Max: 5. This Armor Break lasts 15 seconds and reduces Armor Rating by 177.78. This ability cannot be activated while under 10 Scrap.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Each hit inflicts a Rupture Debuff, dealing 89.1 Physical Damage over 12 seconds.
Each hit consumes 15 Scrap Metal to Power Drain the Opponent. Draining 15% of the Opponent’s Current Power over 1 second. This ability does not activate if Rocket has less than 15 Scrap Metal.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Rocket takes all of his Scrap Metal and constructs a destructive Grenade. Rocket gains up to 51.48 increased Attack Rating for the final explosion based on the amount of Scrap Metal consumed.
This explosion inflicts an Armor Break Debuff, lasting 30 seconds and reducing Armor Rating by up to 1158.62 based on the amount of Scrap Metal consumed.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Rocket uses his Scrap Metal to make the Big Blaster to annihilate his Opponent’s Power Bar. Consume all Scrap Metal to Inflict a 12 second Power Drain Debuff, draining up to 2 bars of the Opponent’s Power based on the amount of Scrap Metal consumed.
While this Power Drain is active, the Opponent is also Passively Special Locked.
This devastating blast also inflicts a Bleed Debuff, dealing 316.8 Direct Damage over 30 seconds.

sig_info: While the Opponent is under the effect of an Armor Break Debuff they are Passively Heal Blocked, whenever the Opponent would gain health from regeneration, they are inflicted with a Power Drain Debuff, draining 1 to 3.5% of their current Power over 0.50 seconds for each Armor Break Debuff on them. If the Opponent has the Salve Mastery active, it is removed.
Rocket’s Shield System grants him 888.46 to 1296.62 Crit Resistance.
While Dormant, Rocket’s Shield System grants him 362.2 to 850.09 Block Proficiency. This effect also persists while the Shield System is activated.

SCRAP METAL - MAX 50: Even while in a fight, Rocket actively hunts for metal scraps to make weapons of mass destruction.
All of Rocket’s Attacks gain increased Critical Rating by 344.12 for each hit in the Combo Meter.
Whenever Rocket lands a Critical Hit, Rocket chips away at the Opponent’s Armor and Weapons, granting him 2 Scrap Metal. This value becomes 3 when fighting against #Metal Opponents.
Whenever an Armor Break effect removes an Armor Up Buff from the Opponent, Rocket steals the broken Armor pieces and gains 10 Scrap Metal.
SHIELD SYSTEM: Whenever Rocket Dashes back and holds block for 1.20 second(s), he will use 25 Scrap Metal to construct a dormant Shield System to protect him from threats.
When Rocket is struck with the dormant Shield System, it will activate and last for 6 seconds. Activated Shield Systems grant the following effects:
+ 1050 Armor Rating.
+ 1050 Physical Resistance.
+ 30% Special Attack Resistance.
Combo Shield, preventing Rocket’s Combo Meter from resetting when struck.
The Shield System can also Block Unblockable Attacks from Mutant Champions. A Shield System will activate early when Rocket would be struck by a Mutant’s Unblockable Attack.
HEAVY ATTACKS: The first hit of Heavy Attack consumes 10 Scrap Metal to inflict an Armor Break Debuff. Max: 5. This Armor Break lasts 15 seconds and reduces Armor Rating by 216.67. This ability cannot be activated while under 10 Scrap.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Each hit inflicts a Rupture Debuff, dealing 926.1 Physical Damage over 12 seconds.
Each hit consumes 15 Scrap Metal to Power Drain the Opponent. Draining 15% of the Opponent’s Current Power over 1 second. This ability does not activate if Rocket has less than 15 Scrap Metal.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Rocket takes all of his Scrap Metal and constructs a destructive Grenade. Rocket gains up to 535.08 increased Attack Rating for the final explosion based on the amount of Scrap Metal consumed.
This explosion inflicts an Armor Break Debuff, lasting 30 seconds and reducing Armor Rating by up to 1412.07 based on the amount of Scrap Metal consumed.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Rocket uses his Scrap Metal to make the Big Blaster to annihilate his Opponent’s Power Bar. Consume all Scrap Metal to Inflict a 12 second Power Drain Debuff, draining up to 2 bars of the Opponent’s Power based on the amount of Scrap Metal consumed.
While this Power Drain is active, the Opponent is also Passively Special Locked.
This devastating blast also inflicts a Bleed Debuff, dealing 3292.8 Direct Damage over 30 seconds.

sig_info: While the Opponent is under the effect of an Armor Break Debuff they are Passively Heal Blocked, whenever the Opponent would gain health from regeneration, they are inflicted with a Power Drain Debuff, draining 1 to 3.5% of their current Power over 0.50 seconds for each Armor Break Debuff on them. If the Opponent has the Salve Mastery active, it is removed.
Rocket’s Shield System grants him 1076.92 to 1571.66 Crit Resistance.
While Dormant, Rocket’s Shield System grants him 439.02 to 1030.41 Block Proficiency. This effect also persists while the Shield System is activated.

Whenever an Armor Break effect removes an Armor Up Buff from the Opponent, Rocket steals the broken Armor pieces and gains 10 Scrap Metal.
SHIELD SYSTEM: Whenever Rocket Dashes back and holds block for 1.20 second(s), he will use 25 Scrap Metal to construct a dormant Shield System to protect him from threats.
When Rocket is struck with the dormant Shield System, it will activate and last for 6 seconds. Activated Shield Systems grant the following effects:
+ 1184.62 Armor Rating.
+ 1184.62 Physical Resistance.
+ 30% Special Attack Resistance.
Combo Shield, preventing Rocket’s Combo Meter from resetting when struck.
The Shield System can also Block Unblockable Attacks from Mutant Champions. A Shield System will activate early when Rocket would be struck by a Mutant’s Unblockable Attack.
HEAVY ATTACKS: The first hit of Heavy Attack consumes 10 Scrap Metal to inflict an Armor Break Debuff. Max: 5. This Armor Break lasts 15 seconds and reduces Armor Rating by 244.44. This ability cannot be activated while under 10 Scrap.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Each hit inflicts a Rupture Debuff, dealing 3652.2 Physical Damage over 12 seconds.
Each hit consumes 15 Scrap Metal to Power Drain the Opponent. Draining 15% of the Opponent’s Current Power over 1 second. This ability does not activate if Rocket has less than 15 Scrap Metal.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Rocket takes all of his Scrap Metal and constructs a destructive Grenade. Rocket gains up to 2110.16 increased Attack Rating for the final explosion based on the amount of Scrap Metal consumed.
This explosion inflicts an Armor Break Debuff, lasting 30 seconds and reducing Armor Rating by up to 1593.1 based on the amount of Scrap Metal consumed.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Rocket uses his Scrap Metal to make the Big Blaster to annihilate his Opponent’s Power Bar. Consume all Scrap Metal to Inflict a 12 second Power Drain Debuff, draining up to 2 bars of the Opponent’s Power based on the amount of Scrap Metal consumed.
While this Power Drain is active, the Opponent is also Passively Special Locked.
This devastating blast also inflicts a Bleed Debuff, dealing 12985.6 Direct Damage over 30 seconds.
